document_data.mainbody:
Saer Preciosa was a patron of the Elfsong Tavern from the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Preciosa was a half-elven woman of the wood elven ancestry with a light woody or bronze skin tone and muddly blue eyes. She wore her blonde hair braided and lightly dyed in lavender.
In the , Saer Preciosa was a frequent customer of the Elfsong Tavern in the Eastway neighborhood of Baldurs Gate. She attended the "Laff Riot" show at the Elfong, a stand-up comedy performance hosted by Harvard Willoughby in Elfsongs side room with a stage. Preciosa, a well-dressed woman herself, thought Willoughby to be a snappy dresser apart from the mans monocle. She hoped the word around town about the comedian was true and he was funny enough to distract her from the looming threat of the Cult of the Absolute.
